article_title: U.S. Military Pushes for More Disclosure on Drone Strikes
article_text:
WASHINGTON—Top military officials are pressing for permission to publicly defend American drone strikes against criticism in the U.S. and abroad, defense officials said.

The issue has come to a head after the military concluded last year that long-standing U.S. secrecy surrounding drone operations has bolstered support for al Qaeda in places like Yemen.

In coming days, a proposal calling for more transparency, beginning with...
